body.p:
Hartford, Ky,
June 3d, 1861
To His Excellency, Beriah Magoffin,
Governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky
Sir:
I hereby respectfully resign the office of justice of the peace for district No. 5 Ohio county Ky.

Ohio Co
Resignation
J. P. Dist
no 5.
June 21. 1861
